text: Avegno was a municipality of the district of Vallemaggia in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 20 April 2008, Avegno and Gordevio merged to form the new municipality of Avegno Gordevio.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 In 1982, the Swiss Heritage Society gave the Wakker Prize to Avegno for the saving of its historical buildings. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Ticino
title: Avegno, Switzerland
